title: State Bicycle Co Riding Fixed, Up Mountains, with Pros: Matteo Jorgenson
content:
State Bicycle Co.‘s Riding Fixed, Up Mountains, with Pros series continues with Matteo Jorgenson.

Hailing from Boise, Idaho, Matteo Jorgenson is America’s top-ranked professional cyclist and a rising star in the WorldTour. With breakout performances at Paris-Nice, the Tour de France, and major wins around the globe, Matteo is known for being both tactical and tenacious.

In this episode, the riders tackle nearly 4,000 feet of climbing in under 12 miles on fixed-gear bikes with a front brake, meme references, and just enough bad decision-making to keep things interesting.
